original_text: And Joshua made him sharp knives, and circumcised the children of Israel at the hill of the foreskins.
korean_text: 여호수아가 부싯돌로 칼을 만들어 할례 산에서 이스라엘 자손들에게 할례를 행하니라

sentences.original_text: And Joshua made him sharp knives
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호수아가 그에게 날카로운 칼들을 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and circumcised the children of Israel
at the hill of the foreskins
